ygData.subject: Re: Characters in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Or for to make it Bard related...bards have three races to chose from, two of which will not give females much clothing.  This is an important issue to you
ygData.messageBody:
Or for to make it Bard related...bards have three races to chose from, two of
which will not give females much clothing. This is an important issue to you
sister-bards, be supportive or delete the thread.

Last night after I was killed by a Sand Giant & the party scattered in the Oasis,
a male wood druid who lived & I were the first to make it back to where we were
camped. He make the usual naked helf/ drool emote so I turn to face him as he
was dressed & could stand guard. I start to loot my body, but I guess he wasn't
watching for SG's because he does the standard "MM behind you" warning, but as my
slow computer won't let me out of the window, I don't see the ....hits you....
messages I am expecting. No Madman, I was just facing so he couldn't see my butt
& he wanted me to turn around in panic. It is enough of a problem, that my
1/2ling niece was started yelling a guys to leave me alone, that her uncle
wouldn't like it, after they didn't get the hint when I tell them I'm happily
married.

> and, to make this bard related... I think the bard class and the cleric
> class appeal most to females because of their cooperative roles and their
> ability to make others around them stronger... agree? disagree?
